channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said at the Milken event (and how his critics responded)
item.description: Also: Trump’s movie tax will lead to fewer and more expensive films, experts said; non-profit retains control of OpenAI.

item.title: Southeast Asia searches for a U.S. trade deal, but the damage from Trump’s tariffs is already done
item.description: On Monday, Malaysia became the latest country in the trade-reliant region to warn that growth may be slower this year.

item.title: Hegseth orders military to shed 20% of its 4-star officers as part of deep Defense Department cuts
item.description: The Army confirmed that there will be a military parade on Trump’s birthday in June, which officials say will cost tens of millions of dollars.
